Author: nosurprises_pls
Text: i’m more “recovered” now, but food still consumes me. i can’t get lost in hobbies / tasks / LIFE anymore without thinking about my next meal / snack.   i wish i could get electroshock therapy or some sort of surgery to re-wire my brain away from being able to enjoy food in any capacity.

Author: fritterly
Text: Too relatable.    I've always seen it as a manifestation of my depression and anxiety? Like depression got me unenthusiastic about things I used to enjoy.. and then anxiety got me obsessively counting calories just to feel a lick of productivity and acheivement.  Don't know how it is for you, but I do know it sucks to be in the midst of it and hope you can get out of this mindset sooner than later.
